answers.answer: This will be the fourth time...im 18 wks today ..Im measuring 21 had mh ultrasound today and like the other three times everythungs fine...best off luck to u

Do u have gestational diabetes? It's a common symptom with that, and that's why I had it. Once I got my sugars under control my fluid level went down. My doctor told me they would only be worried if it was still high after I was full term (now I'm 38 weeks and it's at a normal level). If it had stayed high then they would have induced me at 38 weeks so they could control breaking my water because he said they have to make sure the babies head drops down before the cord comes out because that would mean an emergency c-section.... But you are early so you have plenty of time for your levels to go down.
I got tested for it yesterday, and i didnt have it so i don't know
My doctor told me I had the same problem but after I had a better ultrasound done at hospital it wasn't measuring a lot of fluid... It was actually normal but the baby was just big!

title: Extra fluid
